directions: Over medium-low heat melt butter in a large saucepan. Add garlic, onions and green pepper. Cook slowly, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft.
Stir in tuna, sour cream, curry powder, salt and pepper. Heat until warm and serve.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
title: Tuna Curry in a Hurry
